extendedInfo.description: Brand new YAOBAH in Christmas outfit! Special edition for your Christmas & New Year party. Update required, the old version will not work anymore. Cute Christmas theme, new emoticons function \(^â½^)/, guest mode function (no more login), etc. Enjoy YAOBAH with friends is much more fun and easier now! YAOBAH is a party game of shaking your phone. By counting how many times you shake to play with friends. We have three different game modes for your party. You can take a picture and share the passionate moment to more friends after each game. YAOBAH believes technology brings us closer relationship. Download YAOBAH now and shake out all the fun with your friends! -- How to start play YAOBAH? 1.) Download YAOBAH (FREE) 2.) Tell whoever is around you to download YAOBAH (so FREE) 3.) Open YAOBAH. (2 sec) 4.) Choose game mode -> invite others to join your game (10 sec) Or friends can simply choose to join your game (5 sec) 5.) Insanely shake your phone and lead to the following symptoms (PRICELESS!) : > Chin dislocated due to laughing too hard. > Thin and tighten your arm. > Look like a bunch of lunatics. -- When to play YAOBAH? Racing Mode: Shake more, shake fast! > Drink up! Whoever loses. (It's water, alcohol is bad for your health) Guessing Mode: Can't win racing? Let's guess the total. See who's more accurate. > Differ by how many? Pushups or shots take your pick. (Basketball shots, alcohol is bad for your health) Distribution Mode: Check please! How much for each? Don't let the bill becomes a burden of your gathering. No one needs to be polite right now! > Input bill amount, shake and fight for your wallet! No matter it's family gathering, friends eating out, bar chat, meeting new friends, X'mas party, New Year's Eve, birthday party, etc. YAOBAH is for everyone and everywhere! Boring party? Dull atmosphere? Just play YAOBAH! -- Try it out! How many times can you shake in 5 seconds? Our world record is 48! Also provide 20 sec, 40 sec, and extreme 60 sec mode. Do you dare to declare a 60 second war? YAOBAH reminds you, please hold on your mobile phone tight and remain rational while playing. When together, be together. YAOBAH! YAOBAH website : http://www.yaobah.com/ YAOBAH Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/pages/YAOBAH/473324109374406/

reviews.title: Is it a party game?
reviews.comment: U guys should try this with friends....crazy game. I love it!
reviews.author: A Google User
